sn37.30:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
sn37.30:4.3: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
sn37.30:4.4: If a female has the power of attractiveness but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
sn37.30:4.5: If a female has the powers of attractiveness and wealth but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
sn37.30:4.6: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
sn37.30:4.7: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.
sn37.30:4.8: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of attractiveness, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
sn37.30:4.9: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of wealth, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
sn37.30:4.10: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of relatives, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
sn37.30:4.11: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of children, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.
sn37.30:4.12: These are the five powers of a female.”
